Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Enacts the "facilitating business rapid response to state declared disasters act of 2019"
Summary: Enacts the facilitating business rapid response to state declared disasters act of 2019; relates to exempting certain out-of-state businesses doing work in the state from certain taxes, fees and requirements when temporarily providing services during declared emergencies; and exempts overtime wages of NY state residents from state income tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to thresholds for establishing presence, residency or doing business in the state for out-of-state companies including affiliates of in-state companies that temporarily provide resources and personnel in the state during a state of emergency declared by the governor or the President of the United States
